website_summaries.verdict: The Kyocera Hydro Vibe is an unmemorable phone that can't outpace its competitors, and is only worth considering if water-resistance is a top priority.
pros: Sprint's Kyocera Hydro Vibe is affordable on contract, it's water resistant, and it has a few nifty software features for first-time smartphone users
cons: Call quality was poor, the camera's problems with focus resulted in blurry photos, and data speeds were especially slow, even for 3G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cheap Phone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap Easy to use Has both Front and Back cameras Removable battery Long battery life Waterproof!! Expandable memory Face recognition password (cool!!) Cons: Can be slow A little fidgety No gyroscope No qi charging Camera will not operate in low light Phone call quality is bad (but may be due to my area) I purchased the Kyocera hydro as a replacement for my desire 816 while I fix my screen and this thing is sturdy! No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Brae

customer_reviews.title: I hate this phone cause I went from an HTC 816 ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller did send the item as described and on time. I hate this phone cause I went from an HTC 816 to this since the screen broke. I'm trying to save money to buy a better one but I don't recommend this one. The phone works fine but I went from a high tech phone to this cheap one so it's very annoying. The camera is low quality, videos on YouTube are low quality, screen brightness is horrible, that's why I gave it four starts.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: All-Around excellent. 5 stars if not for the camera...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. For an first smartphone, I couldn't ask for anything better. That is, if it wasn't for the camera. There are 2 issues that I have with it; >1 The video that you take is out of sync. This is exacerbated by any external camera apps. (Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, etc.) That said, I have no idea if it's just this one or not >2 The front camera is mediocre. It is extremely blurry when capturing motion, and completely sucks at night.
customer_reviews.author: Orion Kindel

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I just rec'd this phone the other day and so far I love it. You get a lot of phone for the price. Installing apps is fast, opening email, messages and appl is also quick. If things change down the road I will revise this review but so far so good. I like this much better than the Galaxy Ring which was my previous phone. That phone froze up all the time and lagged in speed. Glad I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Reene

customer_reviews.title: The phone is super easy to set up and get going
customer_reviews.text: The phone is super easy to set up and get going. I'm happy with the clarity of the receiver but not nearly as thrilled with how people have said that I sound on the other end. I've been told as if I sound like I'm "underwater". Great processor speed and slightly above average graphics while watching videos. The camera isn't the absolute 'best' but better than some of the phones that I've had. I hope to never have to test out it's waterproof capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ripley

customer_reviews.title: The battery is very good and the display is sharp
customer_reviews.text: This cheap phone has far acceded my expectations. The battery is very good and the display is sharp. It plays high end games without issue. The camera is a bit lame. It may just be me or need some setting changed, but it is impossible to hold still enough to get a clear shot. It is as iff the shutter speed is super slow. I will update if I figure out a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Tntophat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: A great phone at an awesome price. It has an 8 mp back camera and a 2mp front facing camera Large screen (about 4.7") Runs on Android Works great Very fast, and never lags The ONLY downside is that when you try to send emojis/emoticons to people they receive question marks. They are aware of this and are working to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: MB2332

customer_reviews.title: nice phone. solid
customer_reviews.text: worked for over a year. nice phone. solid. cant tell you how many times I dropped, it. never a scratch. in water more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of this for my wife last year and she's still happy with the performance of this cell phone and the other for my daughter and she loves as well
customer_reviews.author: HEOS

customer_reviews.title: slow but amazing
customer_reviews.text: Can run a little slow at times but I find all you need is a ram cleaner. Works well rooted (using kingroot) and if you use purify while rooted you can stop apps from starting up with the phone making start times amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: My fourth smart phone and by far the best one
customer_reviews.text: My fourth smart phone and by far the best one. Can't be beat for the price. It is very responsive and never bogs down. The main issue I like is the ability to direct apps to the SD storage. I never run short of bytes.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Danko

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting into ahead of time (mid-range specs, screen as ear-piece, Virgin/Sprint service) and for the ~$70 dollars I paid I have absolutely zero complaints. The phone feels solid, the display isn't super hi-res but is plenty bright, battery life is decent, and once I switch from Dalvik to ART (via developer menu) the thing feels faster than my ASUS tablet (ME181C), I kid you not. Getting used to the screen-speaker takes some getting used to, but most of the time I just talk via BT so it's not really an issue. And though I haven't tried its water proof-iness yet (nor intend to, on purpose at least) it's nice to know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: LEV

customer_reviews.title: good for internet thats about it
customer_reviews.text: good for internet thats about it, constantly cuts out on the phone, choppy sounds like under water. for 50 bucks good as a back up phone or to surf the internet. would not advise someone buy this phone if they like the person on the other line to hear what they are actually saying.
customer_reviews.author: Seth K.

customer_reviews.title: I've had this phone for a few months. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a few months. It all of a sudden stopped charging for no reason with some of the chargers I use. I keep a charger in my car, at work, at home and also an extra one in my purse just in case. It worked with two of them but the other chargers work in other phones. Makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was not of good quality and came damaged. def would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an old lady and this is my first smartphone. I LOVE it!!! Great for beginners, It performs as well as the more expensive models I've played with. The battery last for about 7 hrs, and recharges quickly. Takes great pictures. Good screen resolution.

customer_reviews.title: Only con I have with this phone is the poor signal strength
customer_reviews.text: Only con I have with this phone is the poor signal strength. I mainly use it rooted and for wireless tethering for my tablet. When in use it performs better than review sites would lead you to believe.

customer_reviews.title: It's an amazing phone I love it

Probably the best phone I've received in a long while. Never doubt the smaller brands because their amazing haha

Bought a new phone, but kept this one as an emergency backup.

Lately, the cheaper smartphones have really caught up to the industry leaders (Iphone x/Galaxy Sx), which really don't do that much more for 8-10x the price.

customer_reviews.author: sms1985

customer_reviews.title: nice phone
customer_reviews.text: It came in a brand new unopened box. I like the phone. It has the usual bells and whistles everyone comes to expect in a smart phone. You wouldn't know it was an inexpensive phone. It doesn't have much memory (a few gigs), so if you take a lot of pictures/video or download a lot of apps, you will want a micro SD card (preferably regular micro SD not micro SD HD as it recognizes the regular ones better). I've had the phone for a while and am pleased. It's really lightweight and thin. There are plenty of inexpensive cases to choose from (under $10). Overall, I recommend the phone.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: and i am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I received my item way before time,and i am very pleased with it.It is lacking a few things that you would find on a pricier phone,but they are not necessities.I will have to buy another sd card to hold all my apps.The phone only has 1 gb of storage,and the card i have is 8.This is not enough space.I have a lot of music,games and movies.Nothing that can't be rectified.The phone has great sound quality,which is major for me,simple to use,and not so big that it is ungainly.The speed is fantastic.So far,so good

Virgin mobile was on the boxes and when i was trying to get service the phones wasn't theirs. You bw ordering from virgin mobile to get my phones

customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this phone blew my mind. It runs a lot better then a lot of reviews across the web say it does. The picture quality isn't the best but a heck of a lot better than my old phone. The battery life runs out kinda quick when you're playing games, but I don't even mind that because I have chargers everywhere. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a junky phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. It works but he isn't impressed - he plans on getting a phone to replace it after using it only a couple of months. It's fairly slow, takes ages to power on, and it always says "no sim card" even though it is working and does indeed have a sim card in it. I'd suggest getting a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kit N.

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: Afternoon fellow Amazonian's☺so far so good. Came on correct day, phone is nice size for me, I'm not a tech person but I activated it all on my own. My only problem is not enough space. I transfered all my old stuff from my older phone and I'm running out of space. I'm gonna try and find a sim card with more space, not sd card. But gorgeous pictures, videos, louder speaker. I feel like I'm on an expensive phone. My kids said this was an upgrade big time.☺

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Hydro Vibe. It's really quick (even with Virgin mobile "decreasing" the data since it drastically went up once I got it, and went over the 250 for unlimited). Much more storage since I can send my apps to my micro sd card. Runs out of battery quickly if you are using big apps (shop kick, Coupons, etc)

customer_reviews.title: very nice phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: very nice phone for the price. pretty responsive and takes nice pictures. I have not tested the waterproofness but im sure it would b good. My feeling on the new ear speaker technology is iffy i feel it is not that loud when on a phone call. im assuming a bluetooth will fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: TechHouse

customer_reviews.title: She booted right back up and is working like nothing happened
customer_reviews.text: I dropped it in the bathtub today. I fished it out within a few seconds and took the battery out. I dried it off and waited about 15min. I made sure I blew out the water in the headphone jack and micro usb jack. She booted right back up and is working like nothing happened. I also have had Virgin Mobile's LG Volt and its softkeys died when I got a little water on the phone, which prompted my purchase of this one. I am very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: TALKISCHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my nephew and my sister. You cannot beat the value for under 100$ each and it's water and dust proof too ? Come On !!!
customer_reviews.author: William C. Lambeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect the usual from this phone
customer_reviews.text: The Hydro series from Kyocera are amazing, unlike their other phones.
customer_reviews.author: Randy J. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 14yr old who was starting high school and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Vargas

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: Had for a long time now if you get it wet take the back off and clear the water off the speaker or you cant hear music but I love it wish google had better updates tho
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: I just received this phone today. I let it ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this phone today. I let it charge up for 3 hours and it was completely charged. It will NOT turn on!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone Great price
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great, serves the purpose of being a phone... some calls are low in volume but not all
customer_reviews.author: Jasay

product_meta.title: Kyocera Hydro Vibe Black (Virgin Mobile)
product_meta.description: The Virgin Mobile Kyocera Smartphone lets you connect to your world on the go. Designed to provide plenty of functionality, it has features that offer plenty of options for today's smartphone user. Each Hydro Vibe Android Smartphone uses the Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) operating system. This lets you complete a wide variety of tasks, all while navigating your device with ease. You can take and share pictures, surf the web and even check your email easily. Each Virgin Mobile smartphone has an MP3, eAAC and AAC+ player, ensuring that you can carry all of your favorite music along with you. The 3.5mm headset jack allows you to listen privately while on the go and will allow you to hook up a hands-free headset. You can also take "selfies" from both the front and back of the device, ensuring that FaceTime and other communication apps are easy to use. *SIM Card not included
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box
